data.description: This setting instructs the printer to stop extruding at the end of printing the infill before it starts printing the walls. The printer will still ooze a little bit of filament due to the pressure in the nozzle, but by stopping the extrusion early, you'll reduce over extrusion on the shell.
data.img_description: A visualisation of the infill overlap and wipe distance.
data.hints: - Infill wiping is only done at the end of infill lines, when infill lines are connected these will barely occur.
